backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Contains an empty feature evidence report structure.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists brief descriptions of key frontend files including App.tsx, global styles, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Defines theme variables and base Tailwind styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the colorful portfolio UI and sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, login flow, and identity state handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Global psychedelic-themed Tailwind CSS variables and layered background styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, radii, shadows, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, and features for building Consuelo Ayala’s resume/portfolio website, including sections, constraints, and external project links. Contains architectural notes, existing features, and metadata for build planning.
